title: Why You Should Stop Feeling Guilty About Your Kid's Screen Time
description:
Screen time is often vilified in our parenting culture. Parents who let their kids have unlimited or lots of time on tablets or in front of the TV are deemed “lazy” or uninvolved. It’s a bit of a status symbol to some if you don’t even own a TV or if your child hasn’t ever played a video game. The American Academy of…

description:

title: Here Are All the Astro Events to Watch in June
description:
In addition to bringing us the summer solstice—the longest day of the year in the Northern Hemisphere—June is packed with celestial events, from meteor showers to planet sightings. Throughout the month, Mars and Venus will be getting closer together in the western night sky, while Saturn and Jupiter will be visible…

title: 'Lung Detoxes' Are the TikTok Myth of the Week
description:

title: The Out-of-Touch Adults' Guide to Kid Culture: What is 'Bed Rotting'?
description:
This week, all children and young people are rotting in their beds, but it’s not due to illness, disgust, or unemployment. It’s the “new” trend of just not wanting to do anything, because that takes effort. (Relatable.)

title: When to Skip Your Company’s 401(k)
description:
The 401(k)—the most common way Americans save for their retirement years—is only a little over four decades old. Established by the Revenue Act of 1978, the 401(k) became a way to defer compensation tax-free starting in January 1980. Since then, retirement has never been the same, for better or worse.

title: The Weirdest things You Can Buy at Temu, the Internet’s New Favorite Jumble Sale
description:

title: All the Ways You Should Be Using Your College Counseling Center
description:

title: Five Ways to Remove a Rusty Screw
description:
Not only are rusted screws hard to unscrew, they often also have damaged heads that can break off altogether, causing even more complicated problems. Here are five things you can try to remove a rusty, stripped screw without ruining the surface you’re working on.
